Azure._Comments: Azure Service Principal GUID or Username - register credentials with the Functions-PSStoredCredentials.ps1 script
Azure.Name: AADApplicationId

Azure._Comments: Tenant group name in the RDS deployment - normally 'Default Tenant Group'
Azure.Name: tenantGroupName

Azure._Comments: Tenant name in the RDS deployment.
Azure.Name: tenantName

Azure._Comments: Azure Maintenance tag name -  script will ignore any servers with the maintenance tag set
Azure.Name: maintenanceTagName

Deployment._Comments: Username or WVD service Principal GUID - register credentials with the Functions-PSStoredCredentials.ps1 script
Deployment.Name: userName

Deployment._Comments: Indicates if a service principal is being used to authenticate to WVD. Values: True / False
Deployment.Name: isServicePrincipal

WVDScaleSettings._Comments: Peak usage time start (server local time, 24h format)
WVDScaleSettings.Name: beginPeakTime

WVDScaleSettings._Comments: Peak usage time end (server local time, 24h format)
WVDScaleSettings.Name: endPeakTime

WVDScaleSettings._Comments: Days when the script will always be in off-peak mode
WVDScaleSettings.Name: offPeakDays

WVDScaleSettings._Comments: Maximum number of sessions per CPU. If above the threshold, the script will start a new session host.
WVDScaleSettings.Name: sessionThresholdPerCPU

WVDScaleSettings._Comments: Maximum number of sessions per CPU during off-peak. If above the threshold, the not shut down the session hosts.
WVDScaleSettings.Name: offPeakSessionThresholdPerCPU

WVDScaleSettings._Comments: Minimum number of host pool VMs to keep running during off-peak usage time. If set to 0, will shut down all servers without connected sessions.
WVDScaleSettings.Name: minimumNumberOfRDSH

WVDScaleSettings._Comments: Maximum number of sessions per host (used on BreadthFirst mode).
WVDScaleSettings.Name: maximumNumberOfSessions

WVDScaleSettings._Comments: Number of seconds to wait before forcing users to logoff.
WVDScaleSettings.Name: limitSecondsToForceLogOffUser

WVDScaleSettings._Comments: Title of the message sent to users before forcing logoff
WVDScaleSettings.Name: logOffMessageTitle

WVDScaleSettings._Comments: Body of the message sent to users before forcing logoff
WVDScaleSettings.Name: logOffMessageBody
WVDScaleSettings.Value: This session host will shut down in 2 minutes. Please save your work and log off.

ConnectionMonitor._Comments: E-mail subject for server available alerts
ConnectionMonitor.Name: emailSubjectAvailable

ConnectionMonitor._Comments: E-mail body for server available alerts
ConnectionMonitor.Name: emailBodyAvailable
ConnectionMonitor.Value: Your virtual desktop is ready. Please try to log in to your virtual desktop again.

ConnectionMonitor._Comments: E-mail subject for server available alerts
ConnectionMonitor.Name: emailSubjectAcknowledged
ConnectionMonitor.Value: We are preparing your virtual desktop

ConnectionMonitor._Comments: E-mail body for server available alerts
ConnectionMonitor.Name: emailBodyAcknowledged
ConnectionMonitor.Value: Your virtual desktop will be available within 5 minutes. We will send you an e-mail when it is ready. Please reach out to support@enstep.com if you have any issues.

ConnectionMonitor._Comments: E-mail subject for other errors and alerts
ConnectionMonitor.Name: emailSubjectErrors
ConnectionMonitor.Value: Your virtual desktop cannot be started

ConnectionMonitor._Comments: E-mail body for other errors and alerts
ConnectionMonitor.Name: emailBodyErrors
ConnectionMonitor.Value: Your virtual desktop cannot be started at this moment. Please reach out to support@enstep.com for assistance.

ConnectionMonitor._Comments: Maximum time in minutes that the server will wait for a new connection before allowing the server to be shut down.
ConnectionMonitor.Name: ConnectionRequestTimeLimit
